pages.title: Arcane Anvil
pages.text: Late game is reached by obtaining netherite and vast quantities of basic resources, and powered by the Arcane Anvil.$(br2)The Arcane Anvil is the most powerful crafting station, used to level up your scrolls, upgrade armor and spell books, and imbue weapons with spells.

pages.title: More Spell Books
pages.text: The best craftable spell books are shown here. The ruined book is found in Ancient Cities
Dragonskin is dropped by the Ender Dragon

pages.name: Ex: Cryomancer Armor
pages.text: School armor is made from arcane cloth and a particular school rune, following this template

pages.title: Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrades are the final form of progression. By default, any armor as well as spell books can be upgraded.$(br2)Upgrade orbs of a specific attribute are made from a base upgrade orb, and 8 runes of the desired attribute.

pages.name: Upgrade Crafting Materials
pages.text: Arcane Debris is an Overworld equivalent to Ancient Debris, found below y=-38. It requires a netherite pickaxe.
Cinder Essence is dropped from Ancient Knights, which can be awakened by breaking armor piles in the nether.
